name: antfustyle-theme
title: AntfuStyle
desc: A customizable, feature-rich Astro theme for blog and portfolio creation.
article:
AntfuStyle is a customizable, feature-rich Astro theme for blog and portfolio creation, inspired by the minimalist style of antfu.me. The live demo serves as self-documentation, detailing how to configure and use the theme, along with other relevant knowledge expansion. Enjoy exploring all the features this theme offers! â¨

Optimized Infrastructure

  • Zero UI Framework
  • SEO-friendly
  • Auto-generated RSS Feed
  • Support for Subpath Deployment
  • Optimized Local Image Handling
  • VS Code Snippets for Quick Coding
  • Well-organized Project Structure

Content Management

  • Type Safety
  • Markdown & MDX Support
  • Table of Contents Generation
  • Dynamic OG Image Generation
  • KaTeX Math Integration
  • Callouts (Alerts/Admonitions)
  • Directive Sugar for Both Markdown/MDX
  • Code Syntax Highlighting & Annotations
  • Customizable Animated Backgrounds

User Experience

  • Search Functionality
  • Accessibility Enhancements
  • Smooth View Transitions
  • Responsive Layout
  • Light & Dark Modes Toggle
  • Loading Progress Indicator
  • Social Media Sharing Features
  • Image Zoom Preview

More features are continuously being added! ð
